name: MAFIA: Family's Secret
description:
MAFIA: Family's Secret gameplay is a mix of a visual novel and action-based top-down shooter.



Set in the 50's, MAFIA: Family's Secret features a complex storyline about Guidice mafia family, the insides of their business and all the secrets that were silenced in the family for far too long. ... follow their story and dive-in our american mafia world.



Move thought the map and kill all of your enemies to complete the missions along the way and progress throughout the story! Let the amazing colors of our visual style wash over as you mercilessly deal with everything that stands between you and the ultimate meaning of it all.

Violent combat: Stay focused on your endgoal, even though the struggle is real. Develop your own unique way of dealing with never ending enemies in dynamic, lighting-fast combat to always stay on top of your game.

Neversleeping enemy: Move carefully, shoot quickly and remember to always look around. Adjust your combat techniques accordingly to the amount of enemies you've got to complete each operation successfully.

Dynamic missions: Over thirty dynamic shooting missions to fully immerse you into the world of our mafia family. You'll fight in all the major locations of our storyline.



Join our Guidice family members on their adventures and be the first one to discover all their secrets.
